meta.title: Pro UI Base
meta.description: Production-ready Next.js 15 starter for the Mahan File platform.

landing.title: Welcome to Mahan File
landing.subtitle: Build and manage your classifieds experience with a modern, localized interface.

bullets.dashboard: Access your personal dashboard instantly after signing in.
bullets.localization: Enjoy a localized experience in every supported language.

login.title: Sign in with your phone
login.description: Enter your phone number to receive a one-time login code.
login.phoneHint: Iranian mobile numbers only. Enter the 10 digits after 0 — we’ll add +98 automatically.
login.signedInDescription: Head to your dashboard to manage your ads and profile.

errors.requestFailed: We couldn’t send the code. Try again in a moment.
errors.verifyFailed: The code is invalid or expired. Try again.

profile.title: Personal information
profile.description: Update your contact details and location.

image.title: Profile picture
image.cta: Drag & drop an image, or click to browse.
image.helper: PNG, JPG, or WEBP up to 5MB.
image.successDescription: Your profile picture was uploaded successfully.
image.errorDescription: Unable to upload the selected image. Please try again.
image.modalDescription: Crop the image to fit a square frame.

validation.provinceRequired: Select a province before choosing a city.
validation.imageUrlInvalid: Provide a valid URL including the protocol (https://)

toast.successDescription: Your profile information has been saved.
toast.errorDescription: We couldn't save your profile. Please try again.

home.heroTitle: Ship your frontend faster with a batteries-included Next.js stack.
home.heroDescription: This template pairs Redux Toolkit, RTK Query, Tailwind, and shadcn/ui with testing and PWA tooling pre-configured. Hook it up to the Mahan File backend and focus on your features, not wiring.

quickStart.commandsIntro: Run the following commands to get your environment ready:
quickStart.envHint: Update <file>.env.local</file> with <variable>NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL</variable> to point at the backend gateway.

tokensToast.title: Design tokens copied
tokensToast.description: Use Tailwind classes from tailwind.config.ts to stay on-brand.

apiHealth.title: API health
apiHealth.hint: Powered by RTK Query. Update src/features/api/apiSlice.ts to map backend endpoints.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your personalized workspace will land here soon.

filters.title: Search filters

ringBinder.label: Ring binder
ringBinder.empty: Create a folder in your ring binder to filter saved posts.

disabled.limitReached: You reached the saved filter-set limit.

dialog.saveDescription: Name this filter set so you can reuse it later.
dialog.renameDescription: Update the label shown in your saved filter list.
dialog.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to remove “{name}”? This action can’t be undone.

toast.savedDescription: We’ll keep this configuration ready for next time.

filters.provinceModalDescription: Pick one province or target the entire country.
filters.cityHelper: Open the selector to choose one or more cities.
filters.cityDisabledHelper: Select a province to enable city filtering.
filters.cityModalDescription: Choose the cities that should be included in search.
filters.cityModalEmpty: No cities are available for the selected province yet.
filters.districtHelper: Choose one or more districts inside the selected city or cities.
filters.districtDisabledHelper: Select at least one city to enable district filtering.
filters.districtModalDescription: Pick the districts that should be included in search.
filters.districtModalEmpty: No districts are available for the selected city yet.

categoryFilters.title: Category filters
categoryFilters.selectCategory: Select a category to load its filters.
categoryFilters.error: Unable to load filters right now.
categoryFilters.empty: No filters are available for this category yet.
categoryFilters.activeCount: {count, plural, one {# active filter} other {# active filters}}

savedFiltersPage.title: Your saved filter sets
savedFiltersPage.description: Reuse your favourite searches by saving their filters. Delete sets you no longer need.
savedFiltersPage.summary: {count, plural, one {# saved filter set} other {# saved filter sets}} • limit {limit}, {remaining} remaining
savedFiltersPage.emptyDescription: Apply filters from the dashboard and tap “Save filter set” to keep them here.

dialog.title: Delete saved filter set
dialog.description: This will remove “{name}”. You’ll need to save it again to restore it.

notificationsPage.title: Saved filter alerts
notificationsPage.description: Stay on top of new Divar posts that match your saved filter sets.
notificationsPage.emptyDescription: Enable notifications for a saved filter set and you’ll see new matches here.

push.enabledDescription: We’ll deliver alerts even when the app is closed.
push.errorDescription: Could not enable push. Check permissions and try again.

posts.title: Latest Divar posts
posts.description: Freshly crawled listings ready for analysis will appear here.
posts.empty: No posts have been processed yet. Trigger the crawler to see live content.
posts.downloadPhotosDescription: Download individual photos or grab everything as a ZIP archive.
posts.endOfFeed: You have reached the end of the feed.
posts.detailLoadFailed: We could not load this post. Please try again.
posts.copySuccessDescription: Share text is now in your clipboard.
posts.sharePhoneFallbackPrompt: There was a problem fetching the phone number. Do you want to continue sharing without it?

saveDialog.title: Save to folder
saveDialog.description: Select where you’d like to keep “{title}”.
saveDialog.error: We couldn’t load your folders. Please try again.
saveDialog.emptyDescription: Build your first folder in the ring binder to start saving posts.
saveDialog.createError: We couldn’t add this folder. Please try again.
saveDialog.duplicateError: You already have a folder with this name.
saveDialog.limitReached: You reached the maximum number of folders.
saveDialog.notePlaceholder: Add context or reminders for this post…
saveDialog.saveError: We couldn’t save this post. Please try again.
saveDialog.alreadySaved: This post is already inside the selected folder.

noteSection.heading: Your note
noteSection.updateSuccessDescription: Your note for this post has been saved.
noteSection.updateError: Unable to update note. Please try again.

savedDialog.title: Saved folders
savedDialog.description: This post is currently stored in the folders below.
savedDialog.empty: This post hasn’t been saved yet.
savedDialog.removedDescription: The post is no longer in that folder.
savedDialog.removeError: We couldn’t remove the post. Please try again.

contactInfo.missingDescription: This post does not include a phone number.
contactInfo.rateLimitedTitle: Please wait before requesting more numbers
contactInfo.errorDescription: Something went wrong while fetching contact details. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Administration
dashboard.description: Choose a management area to maintain catalog data and platform content.

packages.title: Subscription packages
packages.description: Create and update the subscription offers available to users.

provinces.title: Provinces
provinces.description: Review province records and verify their slugs.

cities.title: Cities
cities.description: Browse cities and confirm their province assignments.

districts.title: Districts
districts.description: Inspect neighborhoods grouped under each city.

divarCategories.title: Divar categories
divarCategories.description: Review the hierarchical taxonomy fetched from Divar.

divarFilters.title: Divar filters
divarFilters.description: Inspect stored filter payloads per Divar category.

postsToAnalyze.title: Posts to analyze
postsToAnalyze.description: Review Divar posts queued for normalization.

notifications.title: Test notifications
notifications.description: Send a manual test notification to a user.

divarSessions.title: Divar sessions
divarSessions.description: Manage admin phone sessions and JWTs for Divar API access.

arkaSessions.title: Arka headers
arkaSessions.description: Manage Arka API headers used to fetch phone numbers.

arkaSessions.title: Arka API headers
arkaSessions.description: Store and update the headers required to call the Arka API for phone numbers.

dialog.addDescription: Paste the required HTTP headers for Arka API requests.
dialog.editDescription: Update headers, label, or activation flags.

toast.missingDescription: Please paste at least one header line.
toast.errorDescription: Could not save headers. Try again.

divarSessions.title: Divar admin sessions
divarSessions.description: Store authenticated Divar JWTs per admin phone number. Keep one active session per phone, lock sessions when they should not be used automatically.

addDialog.title: Add Divar session
addDialog.description: Paste the JWT for the logged-in Divar phone session.

editDialog.title: Edit Divar session
editDialog.description: Update the JWT or status for this phone.

toast.missingDescription: Enter both phone number and JWT.
toast.errorDescription: Could not save the session. Try again.

notifications.title: Send test notification
notifications.description: Create a one-off notification for a specific user, saved filter, and post. Useful for validating websocket delivery and payloads.

fields.messagePlaceholder: Fallback to post title/description if empty

toast.errorDescription: Please check the IDs and try again.

errors.required: Enter user ID, saved filter ID, and post ID.

tips.title: Tips
tips.item1: Use a user/saved filter combination that actually belongs together.
tips.item2: Pick a post that exists in the database so the payload has content.
tips.item3: Keep the browser or PWA open so websocket delivery can be tested live.

divarFilters.title: Divar category filters
divarFilters.description: Reference the categories that already have synchronized filter payloads.

postsToAnalyze.title: Posts waiting for analysis
postsToAnalyze.description: Review the Divar posts that were fetched and are ready for the normalization pipeline.
postsToAnalyze.empty: No posts are waiting for analysis.

preview.title: Divar preview
preview.note: If the preview cannot load because of browser restrictions, use the button below to open the ad in a new tab.

provinces.title: Province directory
provinces.description: Reference the list of provinces synchronized from Divar.

cities.title: Cities catalog
cities.description: Filter cities by province and verify their generated slugs.
cities.empty: No cities match the selected filters.

districts.title: District overview
districts.description: Select a city to explore its neighborhoods and URL slugs.
districts.empty: No districts found for the selected city.
districts.selectCityPlaceholder: Select a city to display its districts.

divarCategories.title: Divar taxonomy
divarCategories.description: Browse categories synchronized from Divar and inspect their parent/child structure.
divarCategories.empty: No categories were found. Run the sync script to import them.

form.title: Create a subscription package
form.description: Define duration, pricing, and allowances for your users.

imageUpload.title: Package image
imageUpload.helper: Upload an optional illustration or keep it empty.
imageUpload.cta: Drag & drop an image, or click to browse.

table.title: Existing packages
table.description: Manage the packages available for account upgrades.
table.empty: No packages defined yet. Create the first package above.
table.freeDaysValue: +{days, plural, one {# bonus day} other {# bonus days}}

toast.createdDescription: The package is now available to users.
toast.errorDescription: We couldn't complete that action. Try again.

validation.titleRequired: Enter a title for the package.
validation.imageUrl: Enter a valid image URL (including https://).
validation.durationInteger: Duration must be a whole number.
validation.freeDaysInteger: Bonus days must be a whole number.
validation.includedUsersInteger: Included users must be a whole number.
validation.savedFiltersInteger: Saved filters limit must be a whole number.
validation.discountedPriceLteActual: Discounted price cannot be higher than the list price.

editor.createDescription: Define the benefits, duration, and pricing for this offer.
editor.updateDescription: Adjust the package settings and pricing.

name.label: Full name
name.min: Name must be at least 2 characters

terms.label: I agree to receive onboarding resources.
terms.required: Please accept the terms to continue

toast.title: Profile submitted
toast.description: Thanks {name}, we will sync data from {company}.

counter.title: Redux Toolkit Counter
counter.description: State managed via RTK slices & RTK Query middleware.

ringBinder.title: Ring binder folders
ringBinder.description: Organize future leads by creating quick folders for each category or customer.

form.title: Create a folder
form.limitReached: You reached the maximum number of folders.

list.title: Your folders
list.emptyDescription: Add your first folder to keep upcoming posts tidy.
list.error: Unable to load folders. Please try again later.

renameDialog.title: Rename folder
renameDialog.description: Update the folder name to keep things organized.

deleteDialog.title: Delete folder
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete “{name}”? You can always recreate it later.

toast.errorDescription: We couldn't create the folder. Please try again.
toast.renameErrorDescription: We couldn't rename this folder. Please try again.
toast.deleteErrorDescription: We couldn't delete this folder. Please try again.

pwa.installDescription: Get offline access and an app-like experience.
pwa.installedDescription: The app is installing on your device.
pwa.manualDescription: Follow these quick steps to add Mahan File directly from your browser.

ios.title: iOS (Safari)
ios.step1: Tap the Share (↑) button in Safari.

pwa.alreadyInstalledDescription: Open the installed version from your home screen for the best experience.

offline.label: Connection lost
offline.title: You are offline
offline.description: We couldn’t reach the internet. Your workspace needs a live connection to load the latest data.
offline.hint: Check Wi-Fi or mobile data and make sure airplane mode is turned off.
offline.action: Once you’re online again, refresh this page to continue using the app.
